categories.name: Women's Swimwear
categories.description: Stylish and comfortable swimwear for women including bikinis, one-pieces, and tankinis.

categories.name: Men's Swimwear
categories.description: High-performance swim trunks and board shorts for men.

categories.name: Kids' Swimwear
categories.description: Fun and safe swimwear for children of all ages.

categories.name: Swimwear Accessories
categories.description: Essential accessories for swimming and beach activities.

products.name: Classic Black One-Piece Swimsuit
products.description: Elegant black one-piece with supportive design. Features removable padding and adjustable straps for the perfect fit. Made from chlorine-resistant fabric.

products.name: Tropical Print Bikini Set
products.description: Vibrant tropical print bikini featuring palm leaves and exotic flowers. Triangle top with tie closure and matching low-rise bottom.

products.name: Athletic Cut-Out Swimsuit
products.description: Performance swimsuit with strategic cut-outs for style and functionality. Perfect for lap swimming and water aerobics.

products.name: Quick-Dry Board Shorts
products.description: Professional board shorts with 4-way stretch fabric and quick-dry technology. Features secure velcro and drawstring closure.

products.name: Competition Swim Briefs
products.description: High-performance swim briefs designed for competitive swimming. Chlorine-resistant with compression fit.

products.name: Mermaid Tail Swimsuit
products.description: Magical mermaid-inspired one-piece swimsuit with shimmery scales pattern. UV protection UPF 50+.

products.name: Superhero Swim Trunks
products.description: Fun superhero-themed swim trunks with bold graphics. Quick-dry fabric with mesh lining.

products.name: Professional Swimming Goggles
products.description: Anti-fog swimming goggles with UV protection and adjustable strap. Suitable for pool and open water.

products.name: Quick-Dry Beach Towel
products.description: Ultra-absorbent microfiber beach towel that dries 3x faster than cotton. Sand-resistant and compact.

products.name: Waterproof Phone Pouch
products.description: Universal waterproof phone case with touch-sensitive screen. Rated IPX8 for complete water protection.
